message: I see on the agenda for LAUNCH that there are "startup mentoring" sessions during lunchtime - how is that going to work?

FWIW, there was a twitter post from Kate explaining to email her to get a slot - when I did she emailed me back and said I got one, and she'd email the "how to" either before or right at the start of the conference. No idea if there are slots still available or the details, but her email is kate@launch.is , or I am sure you can tweet to @launch. At least according to her Twitter stream @kategardiner, she's up in Napa, so give her some time to reply :-)
FYI, it looks like something may have changed, the website now says it's sign-up at the event only - http://launch.is/startup-speed-mentoring/
any more news about this? I don't see anywhere to sign up
Same here, haven't seen a sign up space anywhere? Is this still happening?
